text.autoconfig.doabarrelroll.title: §lDo a Barrel Roll
text.autoconfig.doabarrelroll.option.swi: Switch the roll and yaw axis. not recommended, but might make flying easier for some people.
text.autoconfig.doabarrelroll.option.mom: Makes it easier to make continuous movements with the mouse.
text.autoconfig.doabarrelroll.option.sho: Turn the crosshair into a helpful widget when using the momentum based camera.
text.autoconfig.doabarrelroll.option.ena: Banking slightly yaws the camera when rolling, creating a more realistic, plane-like feeling.
Enables you to use the forward and back keys (W and S by default)
to infinitely accelerate when using an elytra.
This is a very cheaty feature, and can be used to fly very fast.
§4Use this on servers at your own risk, or just don't.
text.autoconfig.doabarrelroll.option.max: Be careful with this one, for some reason things tend to get weird above 3-4.
text.autoconfig.doabarrelroll.option.con: Only applicable when MidnightControls is installed.
